name: @oracly/pm-react-components
author: Oracly Team <team@oracly.io>
description: oraclyv1 dapp's common react components such as van bar and connect bar

scripts.start: rm -rf app && NODE_ENV=production babel --watch src --out-dir app --copy-files
scripts.build: rm -rf app && NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir app --copy-files
